debug&#95;line&#95;offset An offset in the .debug&#95;line section of the beginning of the line number information in the containing compilation unit, encoded as a 4-byte offset for a 32-bit DWARF format macro section and an 8-byte offset for a 64-bit DWARF format macro section. <a href="#a39ba2f462c5c58df1ee8320b5a3f953c">More...</a>

### DebugLineOffset {#a39ba2f462c5c58df1ee8320b5a3f953c}

<MemberDefinition

debug&#95;line&#95;offset An offset in the .debug&#95;line section of the beginning of the line number information in the containing compilation unit, encoded as a 4-byte offset for a 32-bit DWARF format macro section and an 8-byte offset for a 64-bit DWARF format macro section.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugmacro-h/#l00062">62</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugmacro-h">DWARFDebugMacro.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### Flags {#a02a5a9b572028bdf2905040adbef1866}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint8&#95;t llvm::DWARFDebugMacro::MacroHeader::Flags = 0</>}>
The bits of the flags field are interpreted as a set of flags, some of which may indicate that additional fields follow.

The following flags, beginning with the least significant bit, are defined: offset&#95;size&#95;flag: If the offset&#95;size&#95;flag is zero, the header is for a 32-bit DWARF format macro section and all offsets are 4 bytes long; if it is one, the header is for a 64-bit DWARF format macro section and all offsets are 8 bytes long. debug&#95;line&#95;offset&#95;flag: If the debug&#95;line&#95;offset&#95;flag is one, the debug&#95;line&#95;offset field (see below) is present. If zero, that field is omitted. opcode&#95;operands&#95;table&#95;flag: If the opcode&#95;operands&#95;table&#95;flag is one, the opcode&#95;operands&#95;table field (see below) is present. If zero, that field is omitted.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugmacro-h/#l00055">55</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugmacro-h">DWARFDebugMacro.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### Version {#a9a112bfa66dc58b4b039791dc43344e6}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint16&#95;t llvm::DWARFDebugMacro::MacroHeader::Version = 0</>}>
Macro version information number.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugmacro-h/#l00039">39</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugmacro-h">DWARFDebugMacro.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
